Package org.omnaest.utils.table

Interface Summary
Cell<E>  
Column<E>  
Columns<E,C extends ImmutableColumn<E>> Iterable over Rows
ImmutableCell<E> Immutable Cell
ImmutableCell.Position Position representation of an ImmutableCell which implements #hashCode() and #equals(Object)
ImmutableColumn<E> Immutable Column
ImmutableColumn.ColumnIdentity<E> An ImmutableColumn.ColumnIdentity implements #hashCode() and #equals(Object) in the way, that for the same ImmutableTable and index position two ImmutableColumn.ColumnIdentitys are considered equal
ImmutableRow<E> Immutable Row
ImmutableRow.RowIdentity<E> An ImmutableColumn.ColumnIdentity implements #hashCode() and #equals(Object) in the way, that for the same ImmutableTable and index position two ImmutableColumn.ColumnIdentitys are considered equal
ImmutableStripe<E> Immutable Stripe
ImmutableTable<E> Immutable Table
ImmutableTableSerializer<E> Immutable TableSerializer
ImmutableTableSerializer.Marshaller<E>  
ImmutableTableSerializer.MarshallerCsv<E>  
ImmutableTableSerializer.MarshallerDeclarer<E>  
ImmutableTableSerializer.MarshallerJson<E> ImmutableTableSerializer.Marshaller for xml
ImmutableTableSerializer.MarshallerPlainText<E> ImmutableTableSerializer.Marshaller for plain text
ImmutableTableSerializer.MarshallerXHtml<E> ImmutableTableSerializer.Marshaller for XHtml
ImmutableTableSerializer.MarshallerXml<E> ImmutableTableSerializer.Marshaller for xml
Row<E> A Row represents the horizontal Stripe of elements of a Table

By default a Row will reflect any changes to its underlying Table.
RowDataAccessor<E>  
RowDataReader<E>  
Rows<E,R extends ImmutableRow<E>> Iterable over Rows
Stripe<E> Base type of Row and Column.
Stripes<E,S extends ImmutableStripe<E>> Iterable over Rows
StripesTransformer<E>  
StripeTransformer<E> Transforms the elements of a Stripe into a new independent other container instance
StripeTransformerPlugin<E,T> A StripeTransformerPlugin allows to specify a type and a way to transform a Stripe into this type
StripeTransformerPluginRegistration<E> Registration for StripeTransformerPlugin instances
Table<E> General
A Table represents a two dimensional container which allows modification of Rows and Columns.
TableAdapterManager<E> Manager for any adapter which allows to access a Table from any other type
TableDataSource<E> Source of data to be copied to a Table
TableDataSourceCopier<E> The TableDataSourceCopier copies data from a given TableDataSource to the underlying Table using Table.addRowElements(Object...)
TableEventHandler<E> Handler for table events
TableExecution<T extends ImmutableTable<E>,E> A TableExecution prepares an execution which operates on the ImmutableTable passed to the TableExecution.execute(ImmutableTable) method
TableIndex<E,C extends ImmutableCell<E>> Index representation of a Column of a Table
TableIndexManager<E,C extends ImmutableCell<E>> Manager for the index structures of a particular Table instance
TablePersistence<E> A TablePersistence handles the change events from a Table and persists any modified, added or removed data

TablePersistence.setColumnTitles(String[]) and TablePersistence.setTableName(String) are called before any attempt to access the TablePersistence, so this methods are useful to synchronize the meta data
TablePersistenceRegistration<E> Registration for TablePersistence instances
TablePersistenceRegistration.TablePersistenceAttacher<E>  
TablePersistenceRegistration.TablePersistenceAttacherTarget<E>  
TablePersistenceRegistration.TablePersistenceAttacherXML<E>  
TableSelect<E> The TableSelect allows to select sub areas of a Table or join with other Table instances
TableSelect.Predicate<E>  
TableSelect.Predicate.FilterRow<E> A virtual row which can be filtered.
TableSelect.TableJoin<E>  
TableSelect.TableSelectExecution<E>  
TableSerializer<E> A TableSerializer is used to marshal and unmarshal a Table instance into other forms like csv, xml or json
TableSerializer.Unmarshaller<E>  
TableSerializer.UnmarshallerCsv<E> TableSerializer.Unmarshaller interface specialized for csv operations
TableSerializer.UnmarshallerDeclarer<E>  
TableSerializer.UnmarshallerJson<E> TableSerializer.Unmarshaller for json
TableSerializer.UnmarshallerPlainText<E> TableSerializer.Unmarshaller for plain text
TableSerializer.UnmarshallerXHtml<E> TableSerializer.Unmarshaller for XHTML
TableSerializer.UnmarshallerXml<E> TableSerializer.Unmarshaller for xml
TableSorter<E> A TableSorter allows to sorts the Table based on the elements specified by the given column index position
TableTransformer<E> Transforms a Table into instances of other types.

StripeEntity<E> Immutable entity which contains the elements and the title of a stripe
